items.name: Trainer Frame: Oak
items.description: Oak's wood-grain frame for your Trainer Card.

items.name: Trainer Frame: Pallet Town
items.description: Pallet Town border with tiny pixel pines.

items.name: Bike Skin: Red
items.description: Fire-engine paint for your bike's fairings.

items.name: Bike Skin: Blue
items.description: Deep blue enamel that matches Oak's lab floor.

items.name: Bug Lure (10m)
items.description: Boosts Bug encounter weights on routes that already host bugs.

items.name: Nocturnal Lure (10m)
items.description: Draws out nocturnal species at dusk without changing tables.

items.name: Follower PokéDoll: Pikachu
items.description: A plush Pikachu that trails behind the player on the overworld.

items.name: Battle Intro: Indigo Filter
items.description: Adds indigo scanlines to the battle intro wipe.

items.name: Sound FX Swap: Healing Chime
items.description: Replaces healing center chime with a glowy synth trill.
